Radish Boy: That night, Radish Boy decided to play outside the village with his vegetable friends.
While playing, Radish Boy kicked the ball out of the field by accident.
On his way back from retrieving the ball, Radish Boy witnessed enemy insects kidnapping his friends.
He explained the situation to the village elder, but the elder thought it was one of his paranoid tales.
Radish Boy looked up to the elder with pleading eyes, trying to convince him.
The elder had enough of Radish Boy's crying and... WHACK!
Worried about the fate of his friends, Radish Boy decided to go look for them himself.
